column5: How do i resize pics to up load?  My pics are 5 megs
upload them to photobucket....it sizes them automatically.  Sinker
Yeah I used photobucket to up load pics but now my pics look kinda funny in my post.  Am I missing something?
upload the pics, then click on the IMG code under the pic. That copies the code, then just paste it into your post.....easy sleasy......your pics appear like magic.  Sinker
